channel.title: Kansas State University (R-088)
channel.generator: Function write_rss() in R package nrcadams

item.title: Generic ltr to all research & test reactor licensees re current status of revised guidance criteria for research & test reactor emergency planning.FR notice published 811231, amends dates & associated power levels for emergency plans.
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF NUCLEAR REACTOR REGULATION (NRR)

item.title: Forwards IE Info Notice 80-32,Revision 1, "Clarification of Certain Requirements for Exclusive-Use Shipments of Radioactive Matls." No written response required.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, NRC TO UTILITY, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION IV)

item.title: Forwards IE Info Notice 81-22, "Sections 235 & 236 Amend to Atomic Energy Act of 1954." Info should be brought to attention of employees.No other action required.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, NRC TO EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION IV)

item.title: Advises that IE Circular 81-02, "Performance of NRC-Licensed Individuals While on Duty," was sent to listed licensees.
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION IV)
